metadata.title: CVE-2021-28210 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An unlimited recursion in DxeCore in EDK II.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-28210` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

efi-shell-aa64 - 2020.11-4
efi-shell-arm - 2020.11-4
efi-shell-ia32 - 2020.11-4
efi-shell-x64 - 2020.11-4
ovmf - 2020.11-4
ovmf-ia32 - 2020.11-4
qemu-efi-aarch64 - 2020.11-4
qemu-efi-arm - 2020.11-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: edk2 package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2020.11-4').
